title: ideal.al
description: Price Comparison Website for Phones and Laptops in Albania that automatically updates the prices daily and shows the best offers.

title: Tricron
description: A 2D arcade-style game developed using Godot. It involves the user commanding two triangles trying to dodge other shapes by splitting the triangles from each other

title: Steganography Tool
description: Steganography is the art of hiding messages in images by manipulating bits. This is a simple tool that you can encode/decode messaged (I used it for passwords)

title: Good Views
description: Implemented RESTful APIs in Spring Boot for accessing and manipulating movie data. Implemented a dynamic website to view the data and add comments regarding the movies using React

title: Fitness Website
description: Its the start of the year and you are thinking to go to the gym? You came to the right spot because this is the gym for you!

title: Git Gud
description: I have encoutered so many teammates in League of Legends that need this. Private coaching that is! Git Gud offers just that with the best players out there
